traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.desc: Giant water beetles can only breathe water but can hold their breath for up to 8 hours out of water.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Ink Cloud (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: A 10-foot radius cloud of ink extends all around the water beetle if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute although a significant current can disperse the ink.
